import { useContext, useState } from "react" import CartContext from "../../context/CartContext" import classes from "./Cart.module.css" import Modal from "./Modal" import Input from "../UI/Input" const Cart = (props)=>{ const [quantity,setQuantity] = useState(flase) const update = (event)=>{ setQuantity(event.target.value) } const clickHAndler = (event)=>{ console.log(event.target.id) } const cartContext = useContext(CartContext) const cartItems =
    {cartContext.meals.map((item)=>{ return

  • {item.name}

    {item.price}

    • })}
return {cartItems}
Amount ${cartContext.total.toFixed(2)}
} export default Cart
